document.full_text: derrick williams's 3-point play with 9.6 seconds left sent the no. 5 wildcats past the no. 4 longhorns after texas' last-second scramble to the basket came up short.
document.title: west: arizona 70, texas 69: at end, arizona hits shots that count
lines_and_colors: derrick williams's 3-point play with 9.6 seconds left sent the no. 5 wildcats past the no. 4 longhorns after texas' last-second scramble to the basket came up short.
